Text:
thanx for upload........ can you explain how i update ...
did it required to rename to PS3UPDATEPUP 
or
update it directly if any one answer meeeeeeeeeee
plzzzzzzzzzzzz.

Works from 3.55, 4.21, 4.30 CFW without downgrade.

European PSN/SEN users will get an annoying Singstar icon, just like the OFW users. No biggie though.

Update directly from XMB.

X:/PS3/UPDATE/PS3UPDAT.PUP

If you are on OFW 3.56+ you need to get your console downgraded first. Cost around $50.

This CFW is extremely well tested and stable with no DEX patches. Very close to OFW.

No bricks reported from thousands of users.

Two thumbs up!
@mim.sliv its "PS3UPDAT.PUP" NOT PS3UPDATEPUP ... And when updating dont have a disk in otherwise it will take the update from the Disc not the USB

very thanx [ AthenR & dududus ] for Explained that
i appreciate you
if i update it did i lose my games in internal HDD
an update to the PS3's firmware should not harm your internal files at all, safe update
thanx  [[  ps3links ]]   you are the beast ................
